title: NA server down?
body:
Was playing a game just now, and in the middle of it, my whole team disconnected. Two of us are in Idaho, one in Florida, so I know it wasn't just my local internet.

Anyone else having trouble?

replies.body: I think it's happening again Came back up for awhile so I got into a new game, now it wants to act the fool once more.
I was right Loss forgiven back up :(
Also I seem to have a ghost game on top of it all
OK, I'm back in again though I'm hesitant to start another game.
As usual, when real problems arise, Reds are nowhere to be seen.
Yea, i just got disconnected from my game and it says the server is "busy" when i try to log back in.
Riot..... Please... Get your shit together, We don't buy RP and support you so you can sit on your fat ass and do nothing, don't become another money hungry company. The world is shit enough.

get "attempting to reconnect" on screen for 20 minutes it goes away to enemy team level 16 pushing all lanes with baron buff how is that fair and how does that work that my team level 3 is still standing on fountain?
Same here, the Attempting to Reconnect pop up keeps flashing in and out and I can still see what other type and am able to type, but not play.
Yep happened to me and then when I try to reconnect it gives me that stupid Firewall thing. Rito your game.
I'm currently sitting in a ranked queue that won't load into a game. We're stuck in the picks and bans forever.

yup happening to me too
everyone dc
EDIT: hope they give loss prevented
I was just in a provisional too ;-;
Just went down again.. ugh
Same, just put up another post about it before I saw yours. "firewall issues" yeah right
everyone's locked in timer ran down the game just doesn't load

When trying to launch the League client, I get the message: "There was an error connecting to Maestro.  League of Legends will now exit.  Please try restarting the client."  Then it closes the program, offering no other explanation.  I've attempted to restart the client several times now...

> When trying to launch the League client, I get the message: "There was an error connecting to Maestro.  League of Legends will now exit.  Please try restarting the client."  Then it closes the program, offering no other explanation.  I've attempted to restart the client several times now...

Hey **Scorpio82**, 

Try to end-task any open League of Legends client and try again.

Me too, in the middle of a ranked game everyone dc'd, and i soon followed. I am now unable to reconnect
 {{summoner:6}} back to dota -.-'
I'm currently in a ranked game and i can't reconnect. hope i don't get penalized for this. trying to reconnect says server timed out.
Everyone on my team dropped one at a time, after having a ton of lag the whole game. Not fun.
Our game disconnected our whole team, too, and wouldn't reconnect. Must be something wrong server-side.
Happened to me.
Same issue, I can't connect to my game.   Apparently my firewall is preventing me from connecting, but we all know that isn't true.
yeah just happened in my game to.

Was just kicked from my aram game after winning it, then could not invite friends or join a game :(
EDIT: now it is making me reconnect to the aram game I won instead of putting me at the main screen.

OMG me too; I won a Dominion game and wanted to invite a couple people and that wasn't possible b/c it stayed on "Skip Waiting..." Then none of the stats displayed.   So, it happened 7hrs ago and it's happening again. Yo, what is this?!!!!!!!!!! All these attacks are just no...Still haven't bought RP.  I'll probably just eat Subway sandwiches for a week.{{champion:21}}{{item:2009}}

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na

They're investigating it now, and apparently loss prevented is up for the time being... {{champion:26}} We got practically all the time we could have to spend meanwhile, why not just play one of your other favorite games until the server is back up? {{champion:150}} Well, guess I'll be seeing how I do on one of my speedgames meanwhile. (Speedgame = a game a speedrunner runs incase you don't know)
Remember that PAX is livestreaming a LOL panel soon. We're setting up to stream to our TV now that we have more free time today.

I believe that if someone is in a ranked match and some shit like this happens, then both teams should get LP not loss prevention. Both teams should get the same amount of LP as if they had won, or if someone is in their series they could count it as a win. Just my two cents on the subject.

Ever since I read 
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/service-status/REfQ8hps-regarding-recent-instability-on-north-america
I keep thinking things like this are DDoS attacks.
Edit : Your position in queue: OVER 20000
The people doing DDOS attacks threatened to do them PAX weekend, so it could possibly be. We probably won't know either way.

New rule: To save time, Service Status must push updates when the server ***isn't*** experiencing problems. It's almost surprising when I log in and don't see people complaining or notices popping up about server issues.

I am currently in the middle of a game that has been going on for 65 minutes( the timer is still going even though nothing else is) and I have no idea what to do. Seeing as how all it tells me is that it's "Attempting to Reconnect". Anyone have any ideas?
Servers acting like shit and when you do get a game it's a bunch of troll douchebags. So fun much wow.
{{champion:41}} {{champion:104}}                {{champion:1}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:122}}  {{champion:33}}
